questions.question_text: An inactive host that does not contact the Falcon cloud will be automatically removed from the Host Management and Trash pages after how many days?

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: B
verified on the GUI - 45 days

Selected Answer: B
Under document "Host and Host Group Management":

"A host becomes inactive when its sensor doesnâ€™t send a heartbeat back to the cloud for two minutes. Inactive hosts are identified by their Last Seen time. Hosts that are inactive for more the 45 days are removed from the Host Management and Trash pages."

questions.question_text: Which statement is TRUE regarding disabling detections on a host?

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: B
Verified via Falcon console.

choices.A: Hosts with detections disabled will not alert on anything for 24 hours (by default) or longer if that setting is changed
choices.B: Hosts with detections disabled will not alert on anything until detections are enabled again
choices.C: Hosts with detections disabled will not alert on blocklisted hashes or machine learning detections, but will still alert on IOA-based detections. It will remain that way until detections are enabled again
choices.D: Hosts cannot have their detections disabled individually

questions.question_text: Which of the following can a Falcon Administrator edit in an existing user's profile?

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: A
A is the correct answer. I just checked on Falcon console.
Answer is A: Tested in Falcon Console

Selected Answer: A
TEST on Console CS
Only Option Available under CS Falcon Console : First Name and Last Name . no other option to make changes.

Selected Answer: A
A is correct. Tested in the UI

Selected Answer: A
A is correct.verified from console.
I agree to ShuliAbba, Tested on Falcon Console

@plantvast is correct, the site is wrong.
tested on lab - First and Last names can be changed.

Selected Answer: A
Roles are never called 'working groups' in the documentation. The only other option that can be edited on a existing user is first and last name.

Selected Answer: D
Verified on the GUI
